title: League of Legends randomly minimizes while ingame.
body: Title. While ingame, League just randomly minimizes and I have to click on it in the taskbar to get back in. Yes, this can lose me games sometimes and it's very annoying; this happens to me every single match.

replies.body: I'm wondering if there's some background program attempting to shift the focus of your windows, but it's hard to say without much more info of what's going on when this happens. My first step would be a [**clean boot**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974#wq7) to make sure there aren't any other programs trying to take control.
